title: Literally fuck you riot.
body:
When the fuck will you finally start banning people for gameplay, instead of just fucking words.

I literally out of a fucking game, where all fucking 4 players, did not give a shit, just ran around went 0 and fucking 7 and had the excuse of "bro why are you so mad its just a game"

This is a fucking playerbase of fucking 12 year olds, punish them accordingly.

I dont fucking care if someone calls me a %%%%%%, i could give less of a fucking shit about words.

But when a player WASTES HALF A FUCKING HOUR, of my life, because and i quote "its just a game"

HALF A FUCKING HOUR THAT I WONT GET BACK.

YOU KNOW DAMN WELL IM GOING BE FUCKING PISSED.

Hell i dont even care if you ban them from the game, just remove them fucking ranked.

Theres what 6 fucking game modes they could be playing?

Draft blind flex solo rotating and customs.

In only 2 of those fucking game modes, are players required to give a shit, you can literally run it down mid and int feed in norms, and no ones going to give a shit, because norms winrates is worthless.

But the second you do it in ranked, you are admitting you are terrible fucking human being.

Because you are purposely fucking choosing the one game where people actually care if they win or not to play "just a game"

Again, provide a fucking queue thats ranked, where you have $10 a month to play, and require id verification.

Ill fucking pay it, ill fucking provide my id.

And ill exclusively fucking play that queue.

Because atleast ill fucking know that every game i queue up for, everyones trying to win.

Fuck you riot, you dont know how to handle your fucking playerbase at all.
